Question: In 2011, this person appeared in a small but pivotal role as a doctor in Lifetime's anthology film on breast cancer Five.
Hints: By 1977, the show was suffering lackluster ratings and this person wanted to end it, but was under contract to do one more season.
In 1985, this person was rushed to the emergency room, suffering with polycythemia, after years of heavy smoking.
This person's best friend is comedian Don Rickles, who nicknamed him "Charlie Everybody" for his everyman persona.
